pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed-Effect Models, Particularly Spatial Models // Inference in mixed-effect models, including generalized linear mixed models with spatial correlations and models with non-Gaussian random effects (e.g., Beta Binomial, or negative-binomial mixed models). Variation in residual variance is handled and can be modelled as a linear model. Various approximations of likelihood or restricted likelihood are implement, in particular h-likelihood and Laplace approximation.
